org.framed.orm.ui.command.connectionkinds

Class ORMRelationCreateCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • Command
      • org.framed.orm.ui.command.connectionkinds.ORMRelationCreateCommand
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ORMRelationshipConstraintCreateCommand

    public class ORMRelationCreateCommand
extends Command
    Through this command all Relations can be created(invoked into the model tree).
    Author:
    Kay Bierzynski

    • Constructor Detail

      • ORMRelationCreateCommand

        public ORMRelationCreateCommand()
        Constructor of this command, where the label is set, which describes this command to the user.

    • Method Detail

      • canExecute

        public boolean canExecute()
        This method tests if the conditions for executing this command are fulfilled,
        Returns:
        true if the parameter target, source, relation and parent are set.

      • execute

        public void execute()
        In this method the Relation is created/ invoked into the model tree through setting it's parameter. After that three Bendpoints are added to the Relation, when the source and target of the Relation are equal. This needs to be done or else the Relation is not visible/ doesn't look good to the user. When the source and target of the Relation are not equal and more as one Relation exists between the target and the source than a Bendpoint is added to the created Relation to make the Relation better visibile/ acessesible to the user.

      • undo

        public void undo()
        This command is undone through removing the created Relation from the source, the Model and the target and through deleting all the Bendpoints of the Relation.

      • getRelationCount

        protected int getRelationCount()
        This method is for determining the number of Relations between the source and target.
        Returns:
        number of relations between source and target.

      • adaptRelationCreation

        protected void adaptRelationCreation(org.eclipse.draw2d.geometry.Point ps,
                         org.eclipse.draw2d.geometry.Point pt,
                         int relationCount)
        In this method a Bendpoint is added to the created Relation, when between source and target more than one Relation exists.
